div.p: P79/6731, unit 1088, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed and dated by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the two months ending 31st August 1879.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: none; border-right: none; border-top: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: none;

padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: none;
cell.p:
Estimate* of Expenditure for two months
Quarter deleted.
